=== The Homepage of Baishampayan Ghose ===
<nowiki>[[File:me-new-head.png]]</nowiki>
Hello, I am Baishampayan Ghose and I am an upcoming Ubuntu/Debian Developer from India. I have been using GNU/Linux for the past eight years and Ubuntu ever since Warty came out. I am also a Working group member of the Free Software Foundation of India. As of now, I don't have many direct contributions to Ubuntu ''per se'', but I am a regular contributor to the Debian project, which I guess percolates down to Ubuntu anyway.
My contributions to Debian & Ubuntu so far are --

* I am the maintainer of the Bengali (bn) translations to the '''Debian Graphical Installer''' (Since August, 2005)
* I maintain two Debian packages which are in the main repository, (freetalk & itrans) with more coming up soon <nowiki>[[http://qa.debian.org/developer.php?login=b.ghose@gnu.org.in]]</nowiki> (Since December 2005)
* I am a member of the Ubuntu New User Network <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/unp]]</nowiki> (Since July, 2005)
* I am the leader of IndianTeam the Indian Lo''''''Co''''''Team <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/indian-team]]</nowiki> (Since March, 2006)
* I am an Admin. of the Bengali (bn) translations team in Rosetta <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/ubuntu-l10n-bn]]</nowiki> (Since March, 2006)
* I have reviewed/cleaned up patches on motu-reviewers and got the fixes uploaded (Patches given directly to PatrickDavies)
* I have done numerous translations on Rosetta (Since August, 2005)
* I am a member of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MOTU/Teams/Science|MOTU-Science]]</nowiki> Team (Since March, 2006)
* I am a Ubuntu Member (Since March, 2006)
* I am a member of the Ubuntu Bug Squad (Since March, 2006)
* I got accepeted into Google Summer of Code 2006 to work on OfflineUpdateSpec for Ubuntu
* ...

On IRC I usually hang out in #indlinux, #linux-india, #gnu-india, #ubuntu-in, #ubuntu & #ubuntu-motu.
